## hpr2236 :: Hoarding Raspberry Pis

 Show Notes
In this episode, I discuss my growing obsession with building a Raspberry Pi data center.

Items referenced in this episode:

Raspberry Pi
Ubuntu Server for Raspberry Pi
Speedtest-cli usage
Send Emails from Raspberry Pi
Raspberry Pi Git Server
My Workout App
Tiny Tiny RSS
My CRM App
4-layer Raspberry Pi Rack
7-layer Raspberry Pi Rack

Hope this was enjoyable, if not, informative!
